content.raw:
I commented on this [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/15/ign-cmake2/diff#comment-75687240) before noticing your comment.

I am very much in favor of keeping Xenial support \(or at the very least retaining the ability to build from source on Xenial\).

As you mentioned, this repo works just fine off of `ign-cmake1` or `ign-cmake2`. Right now it’s set up to prefer 1 over 2, but it would be totally fine to flip that where it prefers 2 and then tries to fall back on 1 if 2 cannot be found.

Since we’re not using any C\+\+17 features and don’t have any plan to \(since we’re freezing that code after Pull Request #12 and don’t have foreseeable plans to add any more features\), we don’t stand to gain anything by setting C\+\+17 as a dependency.
content.html:
I commented on this here before noticing your comment.

I am very much in favor of keeping Xenial support (or at the very least retaining the ability to build from source on Xenial).

As you mentioned, this repo works just fine off of ign-cmake1 or ign-cmake2. Right now it’s set up to prefer 1 over 2, but it would be totally fine to flip that where it prefers 2 and then tries to fall back on 1 if 2 cannot be found.

Since we’re not using any C++17 features and don’t have any plan to (since we’re freezing that code after Pull Request #12 and don’t have foreseeable plans to add any more features), we don’t stand to gain anything by setting C++17 as a dependency.
